titles.title: Making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1994, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

Rules Committee Resolution H. Res. 287 Reported to House. Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 283 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Providing for the consideration of the joint resolution in the House.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Considered under the provisions of rule H. Res. 287.

Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 283 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Providing for the consideration of the joint resolution in the House.
DEBATE - Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 287, the House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to the rule.

vote.text: On passage Passed by the Yeas and Nays: 256 - 157 (Roll no. 536).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/27/1993--Introduced. Extends the law making further continuing appropriations for FY 1994.
